intro: Ecbolium viride var. rotundifolium, commonly known as the green ecbolium, is a rare and lesser-known plant species belonging to the Fabaceae family. It is characterized by its rounded, broad leaves that are typically a vibrant green color. The plant produces small, pod-like fruits that contain several seeds. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in temperate forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
